name: Users Online Plugin
description: A plugin to display users active within a specified time span.
author: Vespr (Discord: VesprGG)

user_online_time_span.description: Time span (in minutes) to consider users as online.

refresh_interval.description: Refresh interval (in seconds) for updating the online users list.

display_limit.description: Maximum number of users to display in the online users list.
